about_the_game:
This is Kokorogawari's Original Soundtrack album, composed and created with lots of love!

Tracklist:

1. [OP] Yasuraka na Hibiki
2. Old wounds
3. Tick of time
4. Koga’s Shinichi’s theme
5. Something’s brewing
6. Let’s go to town
7. Takahara Yuuya’s theme
8. We could all do with a break
9. Guillam Matisse’s theme
10. NOW you’ve done it
11.Open House festive
12. Warm memories
13. It’s a little awkward
14. The end of the day
15. A slip beyond her
16. Coffee, cakes and chitchat
17. Bound of few
18. Matsubayashi Asami’s theme
19. Love, a little sweeter
20.Flood of emotions
21. ~Kokorogawari~ When her heart floated away
22. Jewel Sky, Elegant Night
23. Winter fun
24. ~Change of heart~ Piano ver. (Bonus track)
